goal.en: This class is a basic course to acquire analysis skills to analyse films narrative and images. The course is organized as an evolutive program from image analysis to film genre analysis. There will be also some theorical texts to read to understand different approaches. Students will be required to present a short oral sequence analysis and to write an analytic essay on a film). A collaboration with 中壢光影電影館will take place: students in groups will take part into the promotion of the film programs analyzing films of their choice (within the program) in a short video or text.

content.en:
Week 1: What does film analysis mean ?
Week 2-8 : analysis bases
Week 9-10: The slapstick comedy
Week 11-12: The melodrama
Week 13-14 : The kung-fu film
Week 15-16: Fantastic cinema (week 15: essay to hand)
Week 17: Final exam
